survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Smart Home Energy Management Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of smart home energy management systems to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart home energy management system?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.
